data.title: Mostly take out
data.text: This establishment is mostly take out. They do have two tables but it's mostly used for waiting for their order. Accepts master card, visa. (Min. Order $10 otherwise a dollar will be added to the charge). If your order is $15 or more entitles you to free delivery. Their shrimp in lobster sauce is excellent. It's sauce is a little thicker then most restaurants. Their dumpling order ( steamed or fried) consists of a quantity of 8. There is a step b/4 you can enter which could make it challenging for the handicap

data.title: Great delivery
data.text: The restaurant has limited parking and seating and is a bit dingy inside...but the food tastes wonderful.  The perfect place to order delivery from, especially on those days and nights that you just don't want to leave the house.
